job.script:
echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_ALL =$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_ALL echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_NOW =$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_NOW echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_A =$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_SHELL_A
echo sample_shell_now = sample_shell_now: $(date +"%Y%m%d %T %N")>>$SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo sample_shell_b = sample_shell_b: $(date +"%Y%m%d %T %N")>>$SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES
